meanings.sent1: The apple is metabolizable and can be broken down by the body for energy.
meanings.sent2: Healthy foods like fruits and vegetables are metabolizable and support our overall well-being.
meanings.sent3: I wish my homework was as metabolizable as my snacks, disappearing quickly without a trace.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a metabolizable ray of sunshine, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time is as metabolizable as a delicious meal, passing by quickly when we're having fun.

meanings.sent1: The metabolizable nutrients in the food provide essential energy for our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Our bodies require a variety of metabolizable substances to function properly.
meanings.sent3: The metabolizable nature of the new fuel source surprised the scientists, leading to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were as metabolizable as fresh air, invigorating and inspiring those around her.
meanings.sent5: Learning new skills is like feeding our brains with metabolizable knowledge, fueling growth and development.
